text: Manuel Batakian, I.C.P.B. (November 5, 1929 â€“ October 18, 2021) was a Catholic bishop. He was an auxiliary bishop to the Armenian Catholic Patriarch from 1995 to 2000. He was the first eparch (bishop) of Armenian Catholic Eparchy of Our Lady of Nareg in New York from 2005 to 2011. Batakian was born in Athens, Greece. Batakian died on October 18, 2021 in Beirut, Lebanon at the age of 91.Bishop Manuel Batakian, I.C.P.B. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Eastern Catholic bishops Category:People from Athens
title: Manuel Batakian
